original_title: The Final Exit of the Disciples of Ascensia
overview: After receiving a VHS tape claiming she's a disciple of an alien species known as the "True Mothers," Amy joins a local UFO cult, donning the name Celisse and befriending a number of other members while under the watch of the cult's peculiar founder, Ascensia.
title: The Final Exit of the Disciples of Ascensia
